mdRecord.dcterms:title: Shining Hour by Keith Winter
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Production poster for The Shining Hour, featuring George Abel, Peter Pagan, Michael Chase, Gaby Rodgers, Martha Orrick, and Elizabeth Wilson. Directed by Margaret Perry and music by Richmond Green Quartet.

Virginia
